exchangeLuckyballComment: Kua utua e koe o tohu mo te Poi Waimarie.
inviteLuckyballComment: Kua whiwhi koe i tetahi Poi Waimarie mo te tono i tetahi hoa.
purchaseGiftCardByPoint: Kua utua e koe nga tohu mo te kaari koha.
purchaseProductByPoint: Kua utua e koe o tohu mo te hokohoko.
luckyDrawUseBallComment: Kua whakamahia e koe te Poi Waimarie ki te uru ki te Unuini Waimarie.
winLotteryPointSubject: I toa koe i te rota
winLotteryPointComment: Kua whakawhiwhia koe ki nga tohu mo te wikitoria i te Lotto.
partnerMailTitle: He Aratohu Tono Hoa a BUFLEXZ
partnerMailContents1: Tena koa tirohia nga tuhinga e hiahiatia ana mo te whakaaetanga hoa me te tuku whakautu me te konae kua piri!
partnerMailContents3:
Tena koa whakapirihia he kape o to kaari ID, uruwhenua ranei
hei manatoko i te tuakiri o to hoa.
partnerMailContents5:
Tena tirohia nga tuhinga me nga korero e hiahiatia ana
mo te whakaaetanga hoa me te tuku mai he whakautu!
partnerMailContents6: (Momo tauwhitinga, te nama ararere, te nama kaute, te ingoa tuatahi o te kaipupuri putea, te ingoa waenga, te ingoa whakamutunga, te nama waea pūkoro a te kaiwhiwhi, me etahi atu)
partnerMailContents8:
Tena koa tukuna mai he nama waea ka taea te toro atu ki a koe
ki te korero ki to hoa.
partnerMailContents9:
Tukuna mai to whakautu ma te imeera ki partner@buflexz.com .
Whai muri i te tirotiro a te roopu mahi i te whakautu, ka whakahaerea te tirotiro me te whakaaetanga a te hoa.
authMailContents1: Ka tukuna atu e matou he nama motuhēhēnga imeera.
authMailContents3: Kua tukuna he taviri motuhēhēnga mo te motuhēhēnga imeera.
authMailContents4:
Whakauruhia koa te nama motuhēhēnga 6-mati tika ki te motuhēhēnga
matapihi i roto i te taupānga, kape ranei ka whakapiri i te tau motuhēhēnga.
authMailContents5:
Ko tenei imeera mo te tuku anake.
Kaore e taea nga whakautu, na mena kei a koe etahi patai, he raru ranei,
Tena koa whakapiri mai ki a maatau ma te pokapū kaihoko i roto i te taupānga BUFLEXZ.
